name: Record
description:
A puzzle platformer where you have to cooperate with yourself in the future. Or is it with your past self ?

Please do not forget to double click on the game display when the game is fully loaded so that it can receive your inputs.

Move the character around with the arrow keys. Use the X key when on a Record button to record yourself for a short time, then replay those actions by using the X key on a play button. Restart a level at any time using the G key.

The game lacks any kind of soundtrack and polish, and collision bugs are known to occur when colliding with corners. I still hope you can enjoy a bugless and enjoyable playthrough !
